 i thought the show started in 1984 and the movie came after that
  Green Lantern <megapimpdaddy069@...> wrote: I think the year it came out was 1983


>From: "Hollywood Narrator" 
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: 
>Subject: Re: G1
>Date: Tue, 5 Mar 2002 03:32:04 -0500
>
>OOC: Dewboy, stop being a moron. That movie came along about 12 years maybe 
>longer than that crappy show BM. Come to think of it, BW was nothing 
>impressive either. You lack any real sense whatsoever and should be put 
>down...
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: dewboy30816
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Monday, March 04, 2002 7:39 AM
> Subject: OOC: G1
>
>
> I figure after 2 days of not posting I can have 1 OOC. Yesterday I
> got Transformers the movie and after watching it 3 times I came to
> the conclusion IT'S AN INSULT TO EVERYTHING BM AND BW! The Autos and
> Decepts were suppose to be smarter than there descendants, but
> Megatron had to use the Trgan Horse tactic that's been outdated for
> 2,000 years on Earth and the Decepts should have radioed a need for
> repairs and NOT stood close to the hole. How dumb can they be. Also
> the Autos tried to get the Dinobots in the shuttle first even though
> they were the strongest fighters and should have been last. In fact
> I think they were the only ones doing in damage in the later fight
> against Unicron. And why were they so happy at the end when they had
> used up the Matrix's energy and basically destroyed their own version
> of heaven? I prefer BM standards where the Matrix is everywhere and
> eternal. And just to be annoying can I have Spike?
>
>
>

>
